page.title: 02LOCAL CLUBS
page.content: {Air Gun Rifle Shooting.}Age range from 16 to 60 years for both sexes. Held at the Dog House. {Darts.}Male only team, 16 to 50 years, all local players, held at Dog House. {Pool.}this is also played at the two local Public Houses. {Country Sports.}Consist of Beagling, Fox Hunting, Mink Hunting, Rabbiting and Game Shooting (mostly run by Syndicates.) {Water Sports.}Canoeing, fishing, and rafting. {Womens Institute.}Held in Village Hall on 1st. Thursday in every month. {Near by Clubs.}Bowling, skittles, tennis, hockey, football, swimming and golf. {Youth Organisations.}Held in nearby towns Youth Club, Guides, Army Cadets, Scouts,BMX Cycling,Young Farmers Club and Pony Club.
